text: The XG7 Trident is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Ram Tah, produced from 3304 to the present. It is featured in Elite Dangerous: Horizons and costs 15,270 CR. The Trident is an all-rounder with a Plasma Autocannon, effective against both shields and hull, especially against Thargoid craft. It has a top speed of 316 m/s and a boost speed of 541 m/s. The Trident is the most effective Guardian hybrid fighter against individual, strong human ships due to its absolute damage, making it ideal for challenging targets.
The XG7 Trident has dimensions of 8.6m x 19.8m x 17.2m, armour rating of 10, and shields of 30 MJ. It has 3 weapon mounts and a top speed of 316 m/s with a boost speed of 541 m/s.
